Retail

We have experience working within different retail establishments from shops to supermarkets.

Here at Tech Dec, we understand how important it is to keep businesses operating whilst essential maintenance is being carried out.

By choosing Tech Dec to carry out your decoration projects, we will ensure that you can continue to operate with minimal disruption.

We achieve this by working closely with clients, Project Managers and architects to ensure the smooth running of projects from start to finish.

Tech Dec’s precise high standard of workmanship ensures important areas, such as shop floors, customer service points and entrances, are completed to the highest possible standard, to present a professional image to the public.

We have experience working within different retail establishments from shops to supermarkets, with our recent projects involving ASDA supermarkets where we carried out full refurbishments, both interior and exterior, including the cafés, pharmacies petrol stations and applying protective coatings to all metal work.

What We Do

  • Design, plan and deliver
  • Maintain regular communication with clients/principle contractors
  • Ensuring all staff are competent and up to date with all relevant certifications
  • Ensuring all deadlines are met
  • Quality checks throughout projects
  • Constant reviews of risk assessments and method statements making sure members of the public and staff are always safe
